body:
@minux if you look carefully, the `theirs` mentioned on that page is an option to the `recursive` merge strategy. The `recursive` strategy with the `theirs` option is not the same as the reverse of the `ours` strategy.

There was once a `theirs` strategy but it was [removed by the developers](http://marc.info/?l=git&m=121637513604413&w=2). (They didn't have our use case in mind.)
